attributes.action: Increase funding in education in Hertfordshire and Essex.
attributes.background: Schools are facing a crisis due to the lack of funding from the government. An increase of students in the education system, and the rise of costs have resulted in schools being unable to provide the appropriate support needed for all students.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This would be the responsibility of your local council.

You could start a new petition asking to increase funding for your local council, if that's something you'd like to see happen. 

You might also like to sign this petition: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/232220
